Uses of Class
factorgraph.NodeFunction

Packages that use NodeFunction
factorgraph Provides classes for managing a Factor Graph: nodes, edges and factor graphs representation. 
maxsum Classes stricly related to Max Sum algorithm. 
messages Provides classes for accessing, reading, sending and managing messages. 
operation Provides classis for operate and executing max sum algorithm. 
system Provides the classes for representing system components.
